name: Bearhalla
description:
Twin stick bear blasting bee farming arcade action!

 Roar at bees to make to them give you honey!

 Explore to the edges of a destructible map for sick guns and more bees?

 Dunk on your scrub friends with live leaderboards, powered by Dreamlo!

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 and another proud entry in the Triger Mountain Arcade Action Collection! 

v1.01 release:

* Corrected resolution bug where tiles went all over the gd place.

* Removed old weapon sprites from hanging on to your bear after restart.
